text: Fish porridge was smooth yet not blended into oblivion (I prefer it this way). It was really tasty. There was a good amount of ginger & the fish was quite fresh.

My parents have been eating this since 30+ years ago and they’ve brought me here to eat since I was young. Same great taste as ever, this has to be my favourite porridge spot in SG. Clean tasting but flavourful, not jelat at all. The pork balls are very very very very very nice!!
Passable but nothing special. The century egg porridge has too much ginger.  $5.50 for a normal size bowl of porridge is expensive.

Freq patron for their pork porridge. Their porridge taste good with bits of ginger shred. Stall is attended by a nice elderly couple ☺️. Usually cycle for takeaway and lady boss will help to double bag my order for safety. Its very thoughtful of her.

simple unassuming porridge store with delicious pork porridge

i. enjoy the. burning 1130 am. hot afternoon porridge from this place

don't underestimate it

it's delicious
